## StringLocalization.get() method

Gets localized string for specified key, interpolation might be used

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(key: string, interpolateParams?: Object): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Key to be localized |
|  interpolateParams | Object | Optional object storing interpolation parameters |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
